original: 對<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>成功行釜底抽薪之計，降低該據點各項發展度，影響錢糧生產！(<color=#bceea7>釜底抽薪 成功</color>)
text: Successfully draw salary from the bottom of <color=#bceea7>$city1</color>, reduce the development of the base, and affect the production of money and food! (<color=#bceea7>Successful drawing of salary from the bottom</color>)
